subject: Fix mobile web scrolling by removing tap gesture Remove tap gesture from mobile web message bubbles to prevent conflicts with vertical scrolling. Mobile web now only supports long-press (500ms) to open action sheet, while desktop web retains click, right-click, and hold-to-press interactions. Horizontal swipe-to-reply still works on both platforms.
